publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

supportDesc.foliation: Foliated in the middle of the lower margin.
supportDesc.condition: Textile inlays of the binding are almost lost. The leather cover of the binding is rubbed off and damaged by insects. The spine is missing.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with brown blind-tooled leather.

history.acquisition: The manuscript was acquired in Ethiopia in 1963-1966.

msItem.title: Hymn or prayer to St. Mary
msItem.note: The text is very damaged and hardly identifiable. The beginning is missing.

supportDesc.condition: The leaf is loose and is badly damaged by insects, the right lower corner is torn down.
Stains of dirt throughout the manuscript. The first and the last leaves are damaged by insects. are torn or damaged and repaired. The right lower corner of is torn down.

handNote.seg: First one or two lines in the beginning of the text and text sections alternating with black; punctuation marks; numbers, and their elements the name of Mary; single letters and words, abbreviations.

q.seg: ኦእግዚየ᎓ ኢየሱስ᎓ ክርስቶስ᎓ አዳምን᎓ ከሲኦል᎓ ኖኅን᎓ ከማየ᎓ አይኅ᎓ እስራኤልን᎓ ከፈርዖን᎓ ዳዊትን᎓ ከሳኦል᎓

list.item: The beginning of the prayer in , very crude, written in pencil, partially erased. ኦእግዚየ᎓ ኢየሱስ᎓ ክርስቶስ᎓ አዳምን᎓ ከሲኦል᎓ ኖኅን᎓ ከማየ᎓ አይኅ᎓ እስራኤል

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.
